scripts.docs:start:dev: cd docs/ && pnpm dlx mint dev
scripts.dev:rebuild: rimraf .angular && nx reset && npx nx run-many -t build
scripts.wp:env:up: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml up -d db wp && docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm wpcli && pnpm run wp:extract:passwords && bash infra/wordpress/scripts/add-passwords-to-env.sh
scripts.wp:env:up:minimal: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml up -d db wp && docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm -e WP_SETUP_SCRIPT=wp-setup-minimal.sh wpcli
scripts.wp:env:rebuild: pnpm run wp:env:clean && pnpm run wp:env:up
scripts.wp:cli: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm wpcli wp
scripts.wp:cli:fast: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm -e SKIP_WP_SETUP=1 wpcli wp
scripts.wp:extract:passwords: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm wpcli sh -c 'cat /scripts/generated-app-passwords.txt 2>/dev/null || cat /tmp/generated-app-passwords.txt 2>/dev/null' > infra/wordpress/scripts/generated-app-passwords.txt
scripts.wp:plugin:test: pnpm run wp:env:up && vitest run --config scripts/tests/vitest.config.ts scripts/tests/wp-plugin-auth.spec.ts
scripts.wp:plugin:check: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm -e SKIP_WP_SETUP=1 wpcli wp plugin check typewoo --format=table
scripts.wp:plugin:check:json: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm -e SKIP_WP_SETUP=1 wpcli wp plugin check typewoo --format=json
scripts.wp:plugin:check:summary: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm -e SKIP_WP_SETUP=1 wpcli wp plugin check typewoo --format=summary
scripts.wp:plugin:check:verbose: docker compose -f infra/wordpress/docker-compose.yml run --rm -e SKIP_WP_SETUP=1 wpcli wp plugin check typewoo --format=table --severity=info
